name: trailtag-extension
description: Test scaffold for TrailTag Chrome Extension (Jest)

scripts.copy:static: mkdir -p ../../dist/extension && (if [ -d dist_ts ] && [ "$(ls -A dist_ts)" ]; then cp -R dist_ts/* ../../dist/extension/; fi) && for f in manifest.json popup.html styles.css assets vendor README.md config.mjs popup.bootstrap.mjs; do if [ -e "$f" ]; then cp -R "$f" ../../dist/extension/; fi; done && if [ ! -e dist_ts/service_worker.js ] && [ -e service_worker.js ]; then cp -R service_worker.js ../../dist/extension/; fi && rm -rf ../../dist/extension/__tests__
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run ts:build && npm run copy:static
scripts.zip: npm run build && (cd ../../dist && zip -r extension.zip extension)
